titles: A collection of English proverbs digested into a convenient method for the speedy finding any one upon occasion : with short annotations : whereunto are added local proverbs with their explications, old proverbial rhythmes, less known or exotick proverbial sentences, and Scottish proverbs / by J. Ray, M.A. and Fellow of the Royal Society.
author: Ray, John, 1627-1705.
publisher: Printed by John Hayes ..., for W. Morden,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
